Notes.Text:
This update for poppler fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2025-11896: Fixed infinite recursion leading to stack 
  overflow due to object loop in PDF CMap (bsc#1252337)
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: In Xpdf 4.05 (and earlier), a PDF object loop in a CMap, via the "UseCMap" entry, leads to infinite recursion and a stack overflow.
